d:testDescription.p: This tests how unspecified attributes affect the return values from the SVG DOM methods related to attributes.
After loading the test, you should see a list of red or green rectangles followed by some text describing each subtest.

d:operatorScript.p: Run the test. No interaction required.

d:passCriteria.p: The test has passed if there is a line of text saying "Test status: PASSED", and there is a green rectangle to the left of that text.
